treeheatr 0.1.0
  • Documentation
  • Vignette

Draws the heatmap.

draw_heat.Rd

Draws the heatmap to be placed below the decision tree.

draw_heat(
  dat,
  feat_names,
  disp_feats,
  class_cols,
  panel_space,
  feat_types = NULL,
  trans_type = "normalize",
  cont_cols = ggplot2::scale_fill_viridis_c(),
  cate_cols = ggplot2::scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "D", begin = 0.3, end = 0.9),
  clust_feats = TRUE,
  class_space = 0.03,
  class_pos = "top",
  class_lab_disp = NULL
)

Arguments

dat

Dataframe with samples from original dataset ordered according to the clustering within each leaf node.
feat_names

Character vector specifying the feature names in dat.
disp_feats

Character vector specifying features to be displayed.
class_cols

Vector of RGBs for the class colors, defaults to a colorblind friendly palette.
panel_space

Spacing between facets relative to viewport, recommended to range from 0.001 to 0.01.
feat_types

Named vector indicating the type of each features, e.g., c(sex = 'factor', age = 'numeric'). If feature types are not supplied, infer from column type.
trans_type

Character string specifying transformation type, can be 'scale' or 'normalize'.
cont_cols

Function determine color scale for continuous variable, defaults to viridis option D.
cate_cols

Function determine color scale for nominal categorical variable, defaults to viridis option D.
clust_feats

Logical. If TRUE, performs cluster on the features.
class_space

Numeric value indicating spacing between the class label and the rest of the features
class_pos

Character string specifying the position of the class label on heatmap, can be 'top', 'bottom' or 'none'.
class_lab_disp

Character string for displaying the label of class label if it differs from class_lab.

Value

A ggplot2 grob object of the heatmap.
